task.title: Viewing a contact's information
task.shortdesc: You can view details about a person you are chatting with or in your contacts list. The Contact Info screen includes the name, nickname, photo or default avatar, title and awareness status displays.

context.p: If the person has provided an email or phone number, this information is also displayed.
You can assign a nickname to a contact from the Contact Info screen. Nicknames are shown throughout the app in the place of the userâ€™s formal name.

step.cmd: Tap the person's name from the Chat or Contacts screen.
Tap the menu icon located on the right and select Contact Info.

choices.choice: Tap the email address to send an email. You are prompted for an email app to use
Tap the phone number to dial the number if you are on a device capable of placing calls
Tap Add Contact to add the person to a group and assign a nickname.
